name: 30 SECONDS TO LIVE
description: August 10, 2031... In an outlying neighborhood of a distant country, a congregation had arisen. This community, which seemed harmless at first, soon became the center of attention with the suspicion of doing illegal activities. While the state denied all the allegations, the police were trying to intervene secretly. However, when the police who went there did not return, there were some who were disturbed by this situation. Among them were Jimmy and Lena, employees of the Skutny Press Agency. You will witness their adventure in solving this mystery. Let's see what will come out of this interesting community.
